name: NHL 2K3
overview: NHL 2K3 is a hockey video game developed for the GameCube, PlayStation 2, and Xbox by Treyarch and published by Sega in the United States, and Atari in Europe. It features Jeremy Roenick on the cover. NHL 2K3 utilizes ESPN's presentation and was the first hockey game developed to utilize the Xbox Live online service. The rosters are from the 2002–2003 NHL season.
